verses.roman:
"āji more bhṛtya kari' aṅgīkāra kailā
yemana aparādha bhṛtyera, yogya phala dilā

synonyms: āji—today; more—me; bhṛtya—servant; kari'-as; aṅgīkāra—acceptance; kailā—You have done; yemana—as; aparādha—offense; bhṛtyera—of the servant; yogya—proper; phala—result; dilā—You have given.
translation: "Today You have accepted me as Your servant and have properly punished me for my offense.
